mainImg.title: The best furniture for your home
mainImg.subtitle: Wide range of styles </br> and trims available

mainContent.title: A house for creating an interior
mainContent.descr:
— Stands for "Home of furnishing", which literally means "Home for interior design"

The Hoff hypermarket chain is one of the largest Russian and dynamically developing furniture chains. This is the only Russian chain of furniture and home accessories operating in the hypermarket format.

opinionSection.title: What do people think about us

personOne.name: Natalia Ivanova
personOne.review: A good store with a large selection of goods for home and garden. The quality matches the price

personTwo.name: Maxim Gerasim
personTwo.review: Huge selection! Furniture, kitchens, household goods. All sorts of little things necessary for life can be bought here

personThree.name: Anna Chernenko
personThree.review: Convenient navigation in the store, top-level service, sellers will always help with the choice and tell you where what product is located

aboutUsPage.quote: In a good design, functionality is always primary, regardless of the forms. But it should not depress emotions

sectionOne.title: What we do
sectionOne.descr: Our main task is to create comfort in your home. We create furniture that will perfectly fit into your interior

sectionTwo.title: Our advantage
sectionTwo.descr: We work directly with proven furniture factories and make inexpensive furniture in our own production, so our prices are really low. In our catalog, everyone will be able to find furniture to their taste and buy it at a low price

Footer.quote: *Hoffi is the winner of the annual Consumer Confidence Award «Brand No. 1 in Russia» in 2022 in the category «Hypermarket of furniture and household goods»  according to the results of consumer voting based on the criteria of fame and perceived quality
